API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.util.BitmapUtil

type
class
version
3.1
Utility class for Bitmap calculations.

Static Variables

burnShapeTexture(default,method) : obj : sandy.core.scenegraph.Shape3D -> scene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> srcTexture : flash.display.BitmapData -> dstTexture : flash.display.BitmapData -> ?ambient : Float -> ?diffuse : Float -> ?specular : Float -> ?gloss : Float -> Void

Computes shape texture map pre-lit with Phong directional light source. Shape must be made of triangles.

concatBitmapMatrix(default,method) : p_oM1 : Dynamic -> p_oM2 : Dynamic -> Dynamic

Returns a concatenation of two bitmap matrices.

<strong>ToDo</strong>: Explain what matrices are handled here

getScaledBitmap(default,method) : p_oBitmap : flash.display.BitmapData -> p_nScalex : Float -> ?p_nScaley : Float -> flash.display.BitmapData

Returns a scaled version of a bitmap.

The method takes a bitmap as input, and returns a scaled copy.
The original is not changed.

movieToBitmap(default,method) : p_oSprite : flash.display.DisplayObject -> ?p_bTransparent : Bool -> ?p_nColor : Int -> flash.display.BitmapData

Converts a sprite to a bitmap respecting the sprite position.

The simple BitmapData.draw method doesn't take care of the negative part of the sprite during the draw.
This method does.

ripShapeTexture(default,method) : obj : sandy.core.scenegraph.Shape3D -> ?size : Float -> flash.display.Sprite

Creates shape texture map template. This is useful for 3rd party models texturing :)
